description: Featuring an ideal mix of style, dependability, and sound quality, the Philips GoGear Vibe 4 GB MP3 Player (SA2VBE04K/17) utilizes trademarked FullSound technology to deliver rich, detailed audio. The versatile Vibe also offers audio recording capabilities, extended battery life, and FM radio. It is protected by a sleek, durable aluminum body, and comes with soft rubber earbuds for comfortable listening.GoGear Vibe 4 GB MP3 Player (Gunmetal)SA2VBE04K/17At a glance:FullSound technology delivers rich, detailed audio4 GB memory holds up to 900 songsFM radio with RDS and 20 presetsCompact design with 1.5-inch full-color displayExtended battery life offers up to 24 hours of listening per chargePlays MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, APE, JPG, BMP, and MJPEG files directly
title: Philips GoGear Vibe 4 GB MP3 Player (Black)
